characters: A child in a blue jacket on the right side of the image, a pedestrian in a blue jacket with a backpack on the left side of the image, a man in a yellow shirt on the left side of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a pedestrian with a backpack suddenly appears from the left side of the image, running into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow shirt suddenly emerges from the left side of the image, running into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle.
actions: The child, pedestrian, and man all suddenly appear from behind parked vehicles, creating immediate collision risks.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, a child, a pedestrian with a backpack, a man in a yellow shirt.
